budu dahama apita witharada?,shad basha parameshwara ugath wiyath mahacharya pattam walin pirigiya mul budusamaye niwan giya rahathanwansela pilibadawa oba asa thibeda???oba kiyana deyin sidda wenne bududahama pilibada danumak bihiwima pamanayi.bududahame ilakkaya eya nowe.batahira lokaya aathulu jathyantharaya bala poroththu wanneda oba pawasana deya nowe.owunnta awashya nirwanayayi.margapalayi.obage danuma owunta pariganakayaka boththamak thada kirimen laba ganimata tharam ada sanniwedanaya diyunuwi hamaraya.obage ilakkaya mehe pasukalinawa bihi una pruthakjana bikshun niwan dakimata aathi kammali kama nisa wapurapu mithya ilakkayaki.enam bududahama ada lankawa waradiyata therum gena aatha.enam bududahama namathi nagaya alla aaththe hisen nowa waligayeni.ema nagayage dashtanaye prathipalaya nam therawadi ratawal adyathmikawath bauthikawath pirihunu ratawal bawata pathwimayi.bikshun dan buduraduntath pitin gos aatha.igenagaththata kamnatha.pramukathwaya diya yuththe niwan dakimata saha margapalayanta pathwimatayi.
